website_summaries.verdict: With its multiple therapeutic uses, you can relax, sleep, relieve pain, or enjoy aromatherapy with this impressive mask.
pros: Crafted for relaxation, thanks to the contoured design and natural silk that keeps out light
Can be used with or without the included gel mask and pouch that's filled with soothing flax and lavender
cons: Falls on the higher end of the price range, but you also get some extras
A bit heavy for some users

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and improved sleep with the mask
customer_reviews.text: How can you go wrong with this eye pillow? It is silky smooth (I don't like the velvety fabrics offered on other eye masks) and completely adjustable with the weight, ingredients of the filling, and the strap is comfortable. They even included extra flax seeds for adding more weight and extra lavender buds for adding more scent. There is even a gel mask included! Just WOW guys you are awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth H.

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable Design Flaw
customer_reviews.text: I bought this eye mask for meditating and sleeping. The first issue I have is that the lavender scent is too strong for me. This is just my personal preference. The second issue is the elastic part that goes around your head. There is a stationary metal piece that is exactly where it rests on my ear making it very uncomfortable. I'm sending it back.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Who does this?
customer_reviews.text: I get migraines and need pressure relief but I am sensative to temp, light and smells. So I take a chance and order this because I can get it quick, it is real silk (so no static), has the cold pac (to keep in the fridge), and the flax for gentle pressure. I was pleasantly surprised, shocked really that it came with two extra pouches of lavender and flax to adjust smell and weight. And the flax isn't just loose in the bag but has it's own pouch. Either the designer has migraines or they listened very closely to clients because they got it right this time. This is going on the gift list for my friends.
customer_reviews.author: Dallas member

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: I am currently suffering from Bell's Palsy and having a difficult time keeping my effected sides eye shut even taping it shut isn't working. So a weighted eye mask was suggested. I ordered this one based on the reviews and it is AWESOME! Not only is the mask itself beautifully crafted and so soft, you also get a cold mask + extra lavender & extra flax seeds to add to it if you want more scent and more weight! Brilliant! I put the cold mask inside of the satin mask and OMG so relaxing and the weight is perfect to keep that eyelid shut while I sleep but isn't doing damage to my skin like the tape & patches are!
customer_reviews.author: wakitalou

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't help me sleep and too bulky
customer_reviews.text: I really wished that I had liked this product. The mask alone did not fit well. I have a mask from my sleep apnea test that covered my eyes better. The lavender and other product inside the pouch made it bulky. I suppose some of it can be taken out. But the smell was way too overwhelming to me. I didn't use the gel mask, but I have used those before. I didn't heat up in the microwave because I returned the item and didn't want to damage any of the materials. I believe that the instructions stated that you can't wash the mask at all as well.
customer_reviews.author: Terri Zahorniak

customer_reviews.title: Best eye mask ever
customer_reviews.text: I've been buying eye pillows for over 30 years, and I've had many very good ones. But this one tops the "very good ones" list. The pillow came with 2 extra packages of lavender buds, which based on how well the buds that came in the mask are performing, I think 2 extra packs could last several years. They also included a package of flax seeds for filler and/or weight. The mask is slightly larger than average ones and gives much better light blocking. The material is incredibility soft and the headband is very easy to adjust.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Bancroft

customer_reviews.title: Great if you like weight on your eyes
customer_reviews.text: I really like this, the strap seems durable and holds the tightness well. It's very bulky, which is good if that's what you're looking for. The lavender aroma is strong and soothing. It comes with baggies of additional flax seeds and lavender buds and a zipper opening to add those if you want your mask fuller. It's comfortable and easy to wear, but if you're a side sleeper it might get bumped out of place by your pillow, because it's pretty bulky. I like it a lot, but I know not everyone likes pressure on their eyes.
customer_reviews.author: CBC

customer_reviews.title: SMOOTH AS SILK
customer_reviews.text: I am absolutely obsessed with my eye mask! I've purchased others before but they usually don't last long because of flimsy quality. This one is in my favorite color- purple....the material is silky and soft to the eyes. The inside has another case that holds the lavender and flax seeds and it smells divine- not overpowering. I had to adjust the straps so that it wasn't too tight on my eyes as I slept. It blocks out all light and the lavender really calms me and helps me drift off to sleep. Easy to clean. Highly recommend and would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: mz.t

customer_reviews.title: Love it, great quality
customer_reviews.text: I love it. Love love the lavender. I bought it to use for meditation, but I also like to keep it next to my pillow at night for the smell. I saw some other reviews about it being too tight or too much stuff inside which is hilarious because the strap is adjustable and the pocket unzips does you can remove some stuff. It also came with a gel cooling eye pillow as well and extra lavender and flax.
customer_reviews.author: C. Burns

customer_reviews.title: Works great as eye pillow or eye mask
customer_reviews.text: The most comfortable eye mask I've had, the silk doesn't make me sweat like others have. You can take the lavender/flax pillow out to wear it just as an eye mask, although I've found it surprisingly comfortable to wear as as an eye mask with the pillow in it, so not just for headaches. I use the eye gel mask in the morning to help me wake up, since the air is cool I don't need to put it in the freezer, it gets cold enough just sitting in my room, to chill eye area for about 10 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Leigh A.

customer_reviews.title: Smells lovely and is nicely weighted.
customer_reviews.text: I really like this eye mask. The lavender has a strong scent, I took most of it out and am using the extra flax seeds provided, but it smells lovely and is nicely weighted. I chilled the cooling mask and put it inside the silk mask and it really helped calm my eyes. It doesn’t stay frozen for more than 1 hour but it is cool to the touch for at least 2 1/2 hours. Overall I really enjoy this product.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie f

customer_reviews.title: Luxury looking mask at great price
customer_reviews.text: I've been sleeping with a mask for 5ish years now and feel like somewhat of a pro. I like this mask because it is thin and soft. I actually removed the weighted insert of lavender because it was too heavy for my eyes. I could have removed some but I actually like the thinness of it. It has adjustable strap which can be troublesome if it were directly in the middle of your head. It is on the side for me. Overall great and luxury feel.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Sue

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: This product t got 1 star on light weight because that is not what it is intended for. It is meant to be weighted. And it is perfectly weighted and has a wonderful lavender scent. It also comes with additional material to make it heavier and additional lavendar for stronger scent. This has be instrumental in getting my sleep schedule on track. Totally worth they purchase, highly reccomended!
customer_reviews.author: Alabama pug mom

customer_reviews.title: The best eye pillow
customer_reviews.text: What a great item!!! I loved how it arrived, with a friendly, informative note about the various ways to use the eye pillow. It also comes with extra packets of herbs and an ice mask that you can slip in (slip out the herb packets first) for those puffy-eye mornings. The scent is heavenly and the silk is soft and relaxing on the eyes. I've had lots of eye pillows and masks and this is by far the best.
customer_reviews.author: Extrapencil

customer_reviews.title: Eye Nirvana
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product! Very versatile - can be used with the removable organic lavender filling as an eye pillow, without any filling as a lightweight sleep mask, or with the removable gel pack for some supercool eye therapy. The adjustable strap holds the mask to your head securely so it stays in place once you check out and start cutting z's. Love it! It even comes with extra lavender and flaxseed to adjust the fill level. 👍 (One minor design adjustment suggestion - my ears tend to get in the way of the strap. Maybe two angled straps instead of just one to avoid contact with the ears? Seems easier than relocating my ears.....) I'm so happy I made this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Chef Marty

customer_reviews.title: Too flimsy
customer_reviews.text: Wayyyy too much going on. When you remove the heavy pack of grain/ minerals or w/e is inside then this is not durable enough to even sleep with, just flimsy and no one is going to sleep with a heavy pack of grain over their eyes. Alone without all the extras, just as something to cover your eyes and fall asleep is uncomfortable. Simple is best and this is just too over the top.
customer_reviews.author: Jevasia Stephenson

customer_reviews.title: It is wonderful for anyone who travels distances by plane
customer_reviews.text: My Yoga teacher introduced me to this silky, mild lavender-fragrance eye pillow which I had to have! It is wonderful for anyone who travels distances by plane, bus, train, or even taking a nap at home. I find it extremely comfortable over the eyes as it completely blocks out light and the mild lavender fragrance is very soothing. The packaging is beautifully assembled with an explanation of each item within. It would be an ideal gift to give for Christmas, birthdays, anniversaries, etc. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Olivia J. Evans

customer_reviews.title: Wasn't for me
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item based on all the reviews, but it actually made sleeping worse for me. The fit was weird, the scented beads make it uncomfortable, and even taking some of them out didn't help. I found the mask to be bigger than I expected. I returned this item. It wasn't a manufacturer issue - it just wasn't a good fit for me.
customer_reviews.author: Moni

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality!
customer_reviews.text: I loved this mask, at first I thought it was a little overpriced but it's very well made. So I would buy it again in a heartbit. I love the shape, the material, the attention to detail in the way it is sawn so it does not mark your skin, the small zipper to remove the filling. It comes with a small bag of replacement seeds and a gel insert that you can put in the freezer. What would make this mask perfect is if they added an scented thin memory foam cluster insert because the seeds make it difficult to use the mask if you sleep on your stomach, other than that this is an excellent product!
customer_reviews.author: VVH

customer_reviews.title: Real flax and lavender eye pillow mask!
customer_reviews.text: This eye pillow is very high quality. I grow lavender in my yard and it smells exactly like it. I cannot wait to wear it for sleep or meditation. The eye gel mask is decent quality too. The other nice touch was the instructions and how to care for the masks. Thank you for a great product!
customer_reviews.author: PNWGirl

customer_reviews.title: I love the zippered muslin bag.
customer_reviews.text: First of all, the color is to die for, but I am a purple lover. The zippered muslin bag that comes with the mask. It's a unique feature I have never seen before in a face mask. It was proven very useful to me. I like to experiment with natural remedies. It is also safe for the machine washer but I would wash it by had to keep it nice looking. I am very pleased with this product and the gel mask was a plus.
customer_reviews.author: Mahogany Crowder (Sweet Rarity)

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Eye Pillow, Worth the $$ and Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: Great eye pillow that suits both my need for an eye pillow and a sleeping mask, to keep out the light on these looong summer days/EARLY mornings. The eye pillow has a removable bag inside, which is filled with flax seeds and lavender seeds, I believe. When using as a sleep mask, remove the inside bag, and slip it on. It's comfortable, smells wonderful, and is great for savasana. It's exactly what I wanted, great quality, and comes from a small business, which I love to support. As a gift, it comes with a gel eye mask, which can be cooled and helps reduce puffy eyes. Something else I needed.
customer_reviews.author: Nichole C

customer_reviews.title: No more dry eyes!
customer_reviews.text: I have this thing where I sleep with my eyes a little open, it’s creepy. I wake up with non-functional eyes that are so dry it’s hard to blink. This mask really helps! The smell and weight work together to relax me into sleep. It also helps with meditation time!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome smell, comfortable fit.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this mask because I have blackout curtains in my room and every time I travel I sleep terribly bc any ounce of light wakes me up. This by far my best amazon purchase. Would purchase again/recommend if you’re sensitive to light. Not wishing for a migraine anytime soon but glad to know I have another tool to help me since this mask also comes w a gel insert. The lavendar also smells amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Heavenly Scent
customer_reviews.text: Fragrant and feels very comfortable when I put it on in the morning as the bright Sunshine shines through my window. Soothing lavender , Truly pleasant and a gel mask was included along with an extra portion of Lavender and flax seeds to replace as needed. Flax seeds are a nice balance as it intermingles with the flowers. Definitely recommended and will be buying several more as gifts.
customer_reviews.author: Barb T

customer_reviews.title: Feels and smells great!
customer_reviews.text: This is not a kind of eye mask I would wear all the time but when I have a migraine or sinus headach the weight of this helps. What is also nice is it comes with a small bag of flax seed to add for more weight or take out and store if there is to much weight agenst your face. It also has a small bag of lavender to refresh your scent. The gell mask has two easy to use straps of two different lengths.
customer_reviews.author: KB

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product!
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about this product. The lavender scent is not over-powering and the silk face mask is so incredibly soothing whether used with the cooling mask, warmed or even at room temperature. I would highly recommend this product to anyone! Also, it appears the seller is an independent who really puts care into the product. There are far too few independent businesses these days and I always encourage people to support when they can. Thanks Asutra!!!
customer_reviews.author: Laurie Capriotti

customer_reviews.title: I like it. It smells great
customer_reviews.text: I like it. It smells great. It's fairly comfortable, the strap isn't a hassle. I don't like things over my eyes, I know it is an eye mask, so I put it over my forehead. It stay generally pretty cool. I pop it in the freezer for a few. The coolness and smell really calm me down while trying to sleep. The only thing I would have to put in the con side of things is that when I am laying in bed and quickly grab the mask to put in on my head, the seeds inside will clump to either side and is very offsided. But just take a few seconds to adjust it and your ok.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: Its great
customer_reviews.text: To be honest, i got this sleep mask by accident.. i was shopping for one but hadnt realized i actually pulled the trigger on this one... anyway it was kinda weird getting used to it, but, now I love it !! Its great and really enhances my sleep and helps me stay asleep!! Give it a whirl !!
customer_reviews.author: NadaBrahmaBaby

customer_reviews.title: Love It
customer_reviews.text: I love love love this. It's simple but they thought about the fact that people will want varying amounts of filling. The silk feels great and the lavendar smells good. It fully blocks light out. Although I will say that when I try to sleep in it, it ends up on my forehead, but when I tighten it, it's a little too tight for my liking. If you're using it for meditation, it's all good.
customer_reviews.author: Laketa H

customer_reviews.title: It's a great eye mask
customer_reviews.text: I loved the email I got after I purchased it, even before I actually received the eye mask. Appreciated the detailed care instructions. The mask is exactly as described and pictured. I love the weight of it. I especially like that the filling is ADJUSTABLE! (I honestly don't understand folks complaining about the weight or the smell, that's the whole point of it being adjustable). Anyhoo, I have migraines so like the fact that it has a gel mask included that can be chilled. Also appreciate that I can adjust the scent level as sometimes migraines make even lavendar smell like the devil's armpit. Happy with my purchase. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Nyasha Griffith

customer_reviews.title: ... down and because I have dry eye but I like to sleep with a fan and this protects my ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a sleep mask because my rest is up and down and because I have dry eye but I like to sleep with a fan and this protects my eyes from the dry air. Unfortunately it doesn’t stay on throughout the night, no matter what I do it ends up on my forehead when I wake up. Good quality material but for me not as good of a choice as I hoped for to help me sleep and protect my eyes.
customer_reviews.author: Janel Holmes

customer_reviews.title: Nothing special
customer_reviews.text: Was dissapointed that i did not get any helpful hints or instructions about any special effects, like heating or cooling eye pillow. I feel for the price i payed ,I wasnt compensated fairly. The way it was decribed in the merchandising, was not the reality of what I recieved. Not a bad product, just did not meet expectations & was overpriced. Just an ordinary ( actually a bit heavy) eye pillow period. Nothing special
customer_reviews.author: Kathyrn

customer_reviews.title: Love, love, love it...
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love everything about this eye pillow! The square-ish shape allows it to cover your temples, forehead, and under eye sinuses. The adjustable elastic strap is substantial enough to keep the pillow from sagging but not uncomfortably tight or stiff. The silk fabric feels lovely and cool against your tired or achey eyes. The interior muslin pouch and extra baggies of lavender buds and flax seeds allow you to make many different adjustments to the weight, flexibility, and strength of scent. This, along with my sound machine, has helped me to have the best sleep I've had in many, many years.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful silk eye mask with extra lavender filler
customer_reviews.text: Love how adjustable this beautifully made eye mask is One can add or remove the lavender to your preference Also the headband is adjustable without having the slider in a spot that would hurt when you sleep on it All in all, this is a great gift or a nice present for yourself. I was told by my eye doctor that an eye mask would help with dry eyes. It might as well be a luxurious silk one!
customer_reviews.author: CB

customer_reviews.title: finally, an eye pillow with space for your nose!
customer_reviews.text: This eye pillow is FANTASTIC. It is shaped so that it does not cover your nose, and it has an elastic band on one side so that you can use it sitting up or leaning back in a chair. It completely blocks all light, and the lavender smells wonderful. It includes replacement lavender and flax seeds. Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: Maggie

customer_reviews.title: GOOD SLEEP
customer_reviews.text: I have used the sleep mask for a full week now and have noticed a huge difference in my sleep quality. Once I figured out the right weight for the mask I had no problems. Would definitely by again and recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Javableu

customer_reviews.title: Lovely, comfortable mask
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two of these masks for my husband and myself. They are well made, fit very well and smell wonderful. The product comes with additional lavender as well as a gel mask. I'm delighted to support a small business and made in the USA products.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: This fits snug and is adjustable. The product comes with extra flax seeds and extra lavender buds, and the pouch is removable and can be opened. This is extremely useful to customize the weight and scent to your preference. The strap is of course useful if you don't sleep on your back. The free gel mask is pretty neat and relaxing. The silk feels great on the eyes as opposed to other fabric.
customer_reviews.author: vks

customer_reviews.title: A nice gift for anyone who might be undergoing cancer treatment
customer_reviews.text: I bought this with the premium aromatherapy mist for my sister who is being treated for brain cancer. Needless to say, she is under a great deal of stress and despite being chronically fatigued suffers from insomnia and general anxiety. She loves lavender, so I sent her this by mail, hoping to help her in some way. She really likes the mask, especially since she can put in as much lavender as she wants. In fact, she used it to take a nap the very same day. I'm happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: kimberley a strain

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfortable Eye Pillow Mask
customer_reviews.text: Love the material and relaxing aroma of lavender. You can remove the bag with seeds if just want to use without. It comes with extra bags of seeds to adjust pressure. I guess once the lavender smell needs to be replaced, too. The gel cool mask is not the best due to the ties, but you can place it inside pillow mask. This definitely makes a great gift.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie Gutierrez

customer_reviews.title: Smells great, but wouldnt stay put!
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to love as the eye pillow smelled yummy. But the pillow never stayed in place, as it is satin. Therefore, it slid everywhere. Woke up, it either tangled in my hair, around my neck (not good) or on the floor. Smelled great, but it traveled.
customer_reviews.author: Trofiwyfe

customer_reviews.title: You Need This!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome! I love everything about this eye pillow. I also love the eye mask sent with the eye pillow. An added bonus for sure! The eye pillow allows for so much flexibility. Have the ability to change the weight, fit and overall experience according to your sleep needs is so liberating and allows one to rest fully every night!
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Pamela Jenkins

customer_reviews.title: Feeling relaxed
customer_reviews.text: Great product. I love the lavender and I feel very relaxed when I'm using it. The gel eye mask was a bonus and I love using it chilled. I can not forget to mention the amazing customer service from Asutra. I highly recommend this product and this company.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good combo, nice scent
customer_reviews.text: The smell is nice and not too overpowering. Came with a recharge which was nice too. Rare to find one like this with a strap, a must have, especially for a side sleeper. I haven't used the ice gel mask as much as I thought I would since I have the pillow mask now.
customer_reviews.author: Merrick9903

customer_reviews.title: I like it dark and quiet when I'm going to sleep ...
customer_reviews.text: My husband is a night owl, and likes to watch movies on his laptop. I like it dark and quiet when I'm going to sleep (other than my fan noise). I bought this to block out the light of his laptop, and he uses headphones to listen. I have to say this eye pillow is amazing! I love the lavender as it helps calm me and I can drift off to sleep easily. This is a beautiful soft and lovely eye pillow, I'd recommend it to anyone!!!
customer_reviews.author: Dana

customer_reviews.title: Sleep till you Dream
customer_reviews.text: Can I give 6 stars? The mask is better than expected and the pictures and description doesn’t do it justice. I’ve used several eye masks in the past and hated them. This mask I look forward to using. I like how the mask unzips so you can remove the herbal pouch. Well packaged as well - since I intend to buy probably 5 more for gifts.
customer_reviews.author: Rocky10000

customer_reviews.title: Can’t live without! Love, love, love!
customer_reviews.text: Product and shipper is fantastic! Items arrived quickly, as stated. The eye mask is perfect and does the trick! I can’t sleep with any lights on and this helps block out the distractions, so I can get a good nights rest. Smells amazing, the material is soft and calming, and the extras they provided are a lovely touch! Will reorder for my family as gifts for the future. Highly recommend the seller and the lavender eye mask!
customer_reviews.author: Brian Tremblay

customer_reviews.title: Great for night shift workers trying to sleep in the day
customer_reviews.text: I work the night shifts at the hospital and recently saw this product recommended on a blog. Sleeping during the day time had benn difficult and I love in a rental in which putting up blackout curtains may be an issue. I slept deeply with this on during the day. Blocks out all light and is a bit weighted so it's comforting. I love lavendar so It was a bonus.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is a nice eye pillow
customer_reviews.text: I love the way this eye pillow allows you to vary the weight and contents of the pillow. My only suggestions are to make a seam between the two sides of the eye pillow so contents do not move to one side and to remember that a little lavender goes a long ways.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Exceptionally well made!
customer_reviews.text: This product is absolutely the most well-made and versatile product I have ever purchased. They thought of every conceivable way a person could possibly wish to use it. The zippers are expertly sewn in, everything is adjustable and changeable -- and washable! The gel mask is also a wonderful product that is adjustable. It comes carefully packaged with complete instructions, extra lavender and flax and includes tips on getting the most out of the product. Beautifully handcrafted to last. I highly recommend it!!
customer_reviews.author: jErickson

customer_reviews.title: Deeper Sleep and Migraine Relief!
customer_reviews.text: This had been a fantastic addition to my sleep ritual. I am a very light sleeper and the weight, subtle aroma, and softness of the material feels incredible on the eyes. Great for migraines, too. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Mirela Merolli

customer_reviews.title: Amazing quality and product!
customer_reviews.text: This mask is amazing! The quality is wonderful. It is so soft and the removable pouch inside is so convenient to be able to remove to clean or if you want a simple silk mask at any point, and the zipper is inset into the seam so you can’t feel it or really see it. The smell is amazing! And the weighted feel is so relaxing. The cooling mask and extra flax and lavender are bonuses! I highly recommend this product. I sleep so well!
customer_reviews.author: Kendra Strink

customer_reviews.title: Best Buy!
customer_reviews.text: So worth every penny. I haven't slept so good in years. The right amount of pressure on my eyes, so I dont wake up with puffy eyes anymore. The light lavender smell helps me to relax and fall sleep. I stay asleep even when the boyfriend turns the TV on.
customer_reviews.author: Mindie Sue Sposari

customer_reviews.title: Great overall feel and comfort!
customer_reviews.text: Just love the feel of the silk on my face. I use this when I am going to sleep, and having the lavender in it makes me fall asleep quickly and deeply. Love the fact that I can chill it as well, especially when I have a headache.
customer_reviews.author: Anabru

customer_reviews.title: Well Made Product
customer_reviews.text: If you use just the sleep mask without the muslin pouch filled with lavender and flax seeds, it works quite well for sleeping. I did notice that light does come in by the nose area of the mask. If you insert the muslin pouch, it smells wonderful, but you can not sleep with it in unless you sleep on you back. With the muslin pouch inserted, it is too thick to wear if you are a side sleeper.
customer_reviews.author: Janell N.

customer_reviews.title: Sleep Aid
customer_reviews.text: I love the way the silk feels, the way the eye pillow smells, and the way it stays in place throughout the night no matter how much tossing and turning I do. I have been using an eye pillow at night for years. I prefer silk because it feels cooler on my face but I had never used one with a strap to hold it in place. I like the way this one fits & it keeps any light out.
customer_reviews.author: Roxie H.

customer_reviews.title: Not weighted
customer_reviews.text: Not weighted, has hebs you can add to the eye pillow. I was expecting weighted item Only comes in Purple, smells wonderful quality is great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: But this sleep
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Great packaging. I love the sleep/relax mask. They included extra flax and lavendar. And I love that the case unzips for washing. Strap is comfy.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca J. Joyce

customer_reviews.title: too full, but workable
customer_reviews.text: the smell is very pleasant. i love that. but its a little too packed w the flax seed for me. kinda uncomfortable on the eyes and u can rly only lay on ur back w it. but i still like it and u can empty some of the seeds out
customer_reviews.author: Megan mcgaugheu

customer_reviews.title: More than I ever dreamed -- love my eye pillow!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to help me sleep on a red eye from LA to the East Coast, but I love my silk eye pillow so much I wear it every night! The lavender smells so soothing without being overpowering, and the seeds and silk actually sooth and reduce my eye puffiness that I have been struggling with since last summer. The free eye gel mask has also already come in handy one particularly bad morning. Love the color, the headband is comfy, love that I have options, the seller includes so many tips -- and most importantly, this just works for me on more levels than I ever expected.
customer_reviews.author: extremely picky

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for sleeping!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve always had issues sleeping because I love pressure on my eyes so I wold use my arms over my eyes or even a pillow over my face, this has definitely been a game changer for the better! It even came with extra lavender and seeds to make it heavier or lighter, very silky smooth fabric as well
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: I love this eyemask
customer_reviews.text: I love this eyemask, it's the best one I've tried. Comes with lots of lavender and flax seeds, including some extra. I use it for sleeping, but I could see it being very nice for meditation as well. Update: several months later, I still love this and use it every night. The elastic is stretching out, but so far it's ok since it's adjustable. I could see possibly needing to replace it occasionally for the sake of the elastic.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Bishop

customer_reviews.title: pleasant surprise
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a sleep mask and was unsure at first. However, it was easy to adjust the headband, it stayed adjusted, it blocked out all light, and it stayed in place all night. I found it more comfortable to use it with the lavender pouch in place because I found its (very light) weight comforting. I do wish the pouch had been divided to keep the seeds evenly distributed. I have not yet used the gel mask.
customer_reviews.author: Royalette

customer_reviews.title: I really like this sleep mask
customer_reviews.text: I really like this sleep mask. It’s soft material and doesn’t bother me during the night. I did have to dump some of the seeds out because there was just too much when I got it. I do like how they sent extra lavender and seeds with the mask. My only complaint would be the lavender doesn’t smell for very long and the lavender in the bag they sent with has lost its scent also. I would recommend this mask to anyone. It’s very comfortable and stays on my head all night.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Love it - buying more as Christmas presents!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product!. This is the first eye pillow I’ve used that actually has straps too so it doesn’t slip off during any slight movement. Previous eye pillows always slipped off and it was frustrating. The gel eye mask is nice and can’t wait to use it. They even send an extra small bag of flax seeds - this company rocks!
customer_reviews.author: smc

customer_reviews.title: Strap sewn incorrectly ... can not adjust to fit over my head!
customer_reviews.text: Just received my eye mask... it was a replacement for the one I misplaced so already knew I loved the product. Just going to bed and went to put my mask on... realized that the strap was sewn incorrectly and can NOT adjust it to put over my head. So very disappointed!!
customer_reviews.author: Tina Duc

customer_reviews.title: Wonderfully scented eye mask!❤
customer_reviews.text: I love this mask! I had to try it on right away. I bought it more for when I travel, but I have been using it every night. I love lavender and the scent is a perfect amount!❤
customer_reviews.author: Grandma

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for. The strap is easily adjustable and the weight from the flax seeds helps me stay asleep.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lavender Lovers Unite!
customer_reviews.text: This eye mask smells SO DAMN GOOD! 😂 I just love the smell of lavender, and as soon as I opened the box I fell in love with this eye mask! I could have sworn this was one of those eye oil/moisture mask but I guess I read the description wrong lol. Either way, I think the soothing properties of this mask will help with my dry eyes.
customer_reviews.author: IamLisaRenee

customer_reviews.title: Blessed Sleep
customer_reviews.text: A horrible building went up in front of me., and there are windowed hallways to elevators with lights on 24/7. Even with my bedroom curtains drawn, light comes in. The sleep mask has really helped me sleep better. The lavender scent is soothing, and the silk cover, soft and easy to wear. I appreciate the care that went into it and the extra gel mask that came with it. All in all a good product, and NOT MADE IN CHINA.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: Very nicely packaged and I love that it came in with extra bags of lavender and flax seeds. Love the extra weight on eyes during sleep. Ever since I bought this I’m sleeping like a baby
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Perfection
customer_reviews.text: First time ever writing a review because this is so amazing. I love the adjustable strap and the zipper so you can wash it. It comes with extra seeds and an ice mask for headaches. The lavander smell is lovely you can actually smell it, but it isn't so strong that it would keep you up. Also the pillow itself is large and soft!
customer_reviews.author: Sharon M Foley

customer_reviews.title: I would give this 10 stars if I could
customer_reviews.text: I would give this 10 stars if I could, by far the best sleep mask+ Weighted pillow combo I’ve had. It feels heavenly and really helps eliviate my stress migranes
customer_reviews.author: Sergey Chepurko

customer_reviews.title: Comfy eye pillow can be worn to bed. You can adjust filling and lavender buds to your liking!
customer_reviews.text: I was delighted to discover that I could adjust the filling and scent intensity in the eye pillow with the enclosed flax seeds and lavender buds. I wanted an eye pillow that would be comfortable for sleeping. This is great in the summer when the sun comes up early, when my spouse is reading his iPad in bed, and on planes. After using mine for a month, I ordered 2 more for my daughters' birthdays.
customer_reviews.author: CML from Cedar Rapids

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product & amazing seller! Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this lavender eye pillow to help me fall asleep and it has helped considerably. I was also so impressible by such thoughtful, caring customer service. It was such a pleasant surprise to receive not only the silk eye mask that I ordered but also additional flax and lavender seeds to change the weight of the mask if desired AND a complimentary eye gel mask. Thank you, Asutra! Definitely recommend and would order from again.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Excellent sleep mask!
customer_reviews.text: Just unboxed this! Hearing really good things from family and friends about this same exact mask! Quality looks superb!!! Can't wait to try it and will update my review!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Places pressure directly on your eyes
customer_reviews.text: Very well made product. Unfortunately I was looking for something to block the air from my fan in my eyes after cataract surgery. This mask lay right on my eyes and would not adjust as the elastic would slip up or down off my face. Wish I could use it
customer_reviews.author: Redbird

customer_reviews.title: Quality price
customer_reviews.text: I'm so impressed. I wasn't sure what kind of quality I was going to get. I mostly picked this one for the free gel mask too. It's very well made. It comes with instructions and tips. It had an extra small bag of flax seed and lavender that I wasn't expecting! I highly recommend this mask. Great buy for the price
customer_reviews.author: M.G. 330

customer_reviews.title: So soft!
customer_reviews.text: Lavender always knocks me out, I love it! The silk is so soft and doesn't leave lines on my face when I wake up the next day and the weight really helps to block out all light!
customer_reviews.author: DianneNYC

customer_reviews.title: Quality eye pillow!
customer_reviews.text: I am super pleased with this eye pillow. It is quality made out silk and the strap holds it in place nicely. The feature of being able to adjust the amount of flax seeds inside is nice. The added bonus of the gel mask is great for tired eyes. I highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Janna Stephens

customer_reviews.title: Really special
customer_reviews.text: This product was so much more than I'd expected. It was put together very thoughtfully, and the lavender smells amazing. The eye mask is soft and feels great, and adding the cooling eye mask was a nice touch. Very happy with what I received and would definitely buy from this company again. I loved the card telling me they are a small made-in-the-US company.
customer_reviews.author: orangelemonpurple

customer_reviews.title: Smells Amazing if want it to!
customer_reviews.text: I ❤️ this eye mask so much I just purchased it for my friend. I get such a great nights sleep when I wear it! It it so under priced! Don’t look any place else for any other mask! Did I say I love it? I really love it! I am not a family member, friend or being paid. Very well made and smells AMAZING!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Barkley5

customer_reviews.title: Extra ordinary Lavender eye pillow
customer_reviews.text: Two things, replaceable lavender and the gel pack that comes with it to insert for tired eyes. High quality silk.
customer_reviews.author: Nadine Butler

customer_reviews.title: Asutra  products have changed  my sleeping habits positively
customer_reviews.text: I also bought a smart watch with I think all the Asutra products ! They all help my pain and last night my spartan watch said I had 3.45 minutes of deep sleep! All product are Great use to be up all night if I slept a hr or two that was it!
customer_reviews.author: Deena C.

customer_reviews.title: High quality
customer_reviews.text: What a wonderfully thought out eye pillow. It came with extra lavender and flaxseed that you can add if need be. Very high quality and wonderful eye mask. I highly recommend this and will be placing another order
customer_reviews.author: Steve B

customer_reviews.title: Eye Mask Luxury
customer_reviews.text: There were so many components to this eye mask I was very impressed. Great material, easily adjustable comfortable band. Seamless zippered mask, which unzips where you find a pouch that holds the flax seeds and buds. There are (2) bonus packs that come with the mask so that you can adjust the weight and scent to your liking. Oh and I can't forget the gel eye mask. This was very well made and packaged with a lot of care. Job Well Done!!!
customer_reviews.author: isisbee

customer_reviews.title: I don't like it at all
customer_reviews.text: I don't like it at all, it feels like a beanbag on my face and presses on my eyes. The seeds shift around so they're not even. Can't wear it, although I tried for several weeks to get used to it.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly R. Luellen

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and so unique
customer_reviews.text: This is such a pretty soft silky purple and I can use it as multiple uses !!! And then they even sent two packages extra of the flax seed. And a cold mat ! Great purchase. Thank u so much !
customer_reviews.author: Dody metzger

customer_reviews.title: My favorite eye pillow
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this pillow! It is well made, and the silk is so luxurious! The adjustable straps have made this my favorite eye pillow that I own! The only reason I have it 4 stars instead of 5 stars is that I feel like there is way more flaxseed than lavender seed. However, they do give you a bad of extra seeds that you can add to the pillow. I personally want a very strong sense of lavender, however If your just looking for a hint then it will be perfect for you. Overall great product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased!
customer_reviews.text: This is the second time I ordered this pillow! Inadvertently, the first one I had was in with my sheets when I washed them. This is not good, as you can imagine. Fortunately, I was able to order another one!
customer_reviews.author: Roberta Dorn

customer_reviews.title: No Velcro to snag my satin pillowcase!
customer_reviews.text: The BEST eye mask I have ever used. The lavender is just enough without being clothing, and the buckwheat filling actually helps to mold the mask to the upper face. Wonderful!
customer_reviews.author: Marcia S. Hanna

customer_reviews.title: Strong, fresh lavedar scent!
customer_reviews.text: When I pulled the package out of my mail box today, I could smell the lavender! I am so excited about this product. The gel eye mask is great, but even better is the etra little packet of lavender and flax seed. It exceeded my expectations, and now my husband wants one of his own! This will make a great gift for some of my yogi friends too. I definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Leah

customer_reviews.title: Great but for my spouse. She slept 12 hours with this.
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my wife and she absolutely love it. Great quality and the flaxseeds and lavendar smell delightful.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Luxury
customer_reviews.text: Feels like luxury over my eyes. A Soft pillow filled with wonderful scents! I’m a flight attendant and a travel everywhere with my new silk eye mask. I absolutely love it!
customer_reviews.author: S.Wright

customer_reviews.title: Love this product
customer_reviews.text: It hits all the pressure points and occludes light awesomely. The herbal sent puts you to sleep. It marvelous. Only have had it a few months but seems to be durable. Would buy again
customer_reviews.author: Blank

customer_reviews.title: Not weighted eye mask
customer_reviews.text: What came was not weighted, not filled with lavender or flax seeds, and definitely not asutra brand. I was completely ripped off for a product not worth more than ten dollars
customer_reviews.author: Emma

customer_reviews.title: Luxurious
customer_reviews.text: Including extra lavender and flax seeds was an extra nice touch.
customer_reviews.author: Breanna Hunt

customer_reviews.title: Awkward to sleep with
customer_reviews.text: The fabric itself is really soft, but the shape and bulk of the filling makes it really awkward for sleeping. I understand that you can remove some of the filling- but it shifts around and is not very practical. I ended up taking it off the very first night and ordering something else. Would not recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love my Lavender Silk Eye Pillow Cover
customer_reviews.text: I love my Lavender Silk Eye Pillow Cover! The lavender is nice and calming for when I am going to bed. The adjustable straps are a great addition for comfort! and I love that I have the liquid cool gel cover as well. I will keep this product until the very end! Love this company love this product!
customer_reviews.author: Tali G

product_meta.title: ASUTRA Silk Eye Pillow for Sleep, Purple | Filled w/Lavender & Flax Seeds | 100% Hypoallergenic | Meditation & Light Blocking
feature_bullets: ALL-NATURAL INGREDIENTS: The Asutra Silk Eye Pillow is made of 100% silk and can be used as a sleep mask, for meditation, as well as shavasana during yoga. This lavender-scented eye pillow is filled with lavender and flax seeds.

GET VENUS WILLIAMS' FAVORITE EYE PILLOW: Our Silk Eye Pillow is a must-have for tennis great Venus Williams. She sleeps with it every night to maximize her sleep. See Venus bedtime routine video below.

100% SILK EYE PILLOW: We use 100% silk that is free of toxic materials to produce a luxurious yet affordable eye pillow that can help you float away on a cloud of relaxation. It comfortably fits around the nose and helps to block out light.
NOT TESTED ON ANIMALS: This pillow includes ingredients that haven't been tested on animals. We take pride in making products with high-quality ingredients that do not endanger our furry friends.

FREE SOOTHING EYE GEL MASK: This gel mask can help relieves eye fatigue and feels great on tired eyes. Place it in the fridge for a soothing, cooling effect. It is fully adjustable to fit everyone and comes packaged with your purchase.

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
